name: Sore Throat
description: Pain or irritation of the throat.

name: Cough
description: A sudden, forceful release of air from the lungs.

name: Fatigue
description: General feeling of tiredness or lack of energy.

name: Sneezing
description: Sudden, involuntary expulsion of air from the nose and mouth.

name: Bone Pain
description: A dull, aching pain in bones.
